    • Uses of PlayerContext in controller

      Fields in controller declared as PlayerContext 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private PlayerContext CPUPlayer.context
      the context object that this class manipulates
      private PlayerContext HumanPlayer.context
      a reference to the context object that this class manipulates
      Methods in controller with parameters of type PlayerContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PlayerContext.play(PlayerContext p)
      As this object IS a player it needs a play() method, this method calls the play method in whichever concrete subclass of player is currently the active player.
      void CPUPlayer.play(PlayerContext p)
      takes a reference to the context object that called it and sets the internal context var equal to this.
      void Player.play(PlayerContext backref)
      Play the game
      void HumanPlayer.play(PlayerContext p)
      takes a reference to the context object that called it and sets the internal context var equal equal to this.
